General.Name: Momentus Inc
General.Description: Momentus Inc. operates as a commercial space company in the United States. The company offers satellites, satellite buses, and satellite technologies, including solar array; transportation and infrastructure services, such as -space transportation, hosted payloads, and other in-orbit services to enable the commercialization of space. It serves satellite operators. The company is headquartered in San Jose, California.
General.Address: 3901 North First Street, San Jose, CA, United States, 95134
